items.title: Why Brittle Bones Aren’t Just a Woman’s Problem
items.description: More men are now living long enough to develop osteoporosis. But few are aware of the risk, and fewer still are screened and treated.

items.title: Listen: Green Goodbyes: Choosing an Eco-Friendly Burial
items.description: Environmental and economic concerns prompt some people to explore obsequies options beyond metal caskets and cremation.

items.title: California’s Health Insurance Marketplace Braces for Chaos as Shutdown Persists
items.description: Jessica Altman, the head of California’s Affordable Care Act health insurance marketplace, warns letters will be sent out this week with sky-high prem...

items.title: Journalists Dig Into Government Shutdown and Rural Doctor Drought
items.description: KFF Health News journalists made the rounds on national media recently to discuss topical stories. Here’s a collection of their appearances.

items.title: As Trump Denies Climate Change, At Least 170 Hospitals Face Major Flood Risk
items.description: Get our weekly newsletter, The Week in Brief, featuring a roundup of our original coverage, Fridays at 2 p.m. ET.
